data.caption: Commencement Of Commercial Production
data.news_body: M/s. Alcu Industries Private Limited a wholly owned subsidiary company has successfully commenced commercial production of winding and conductivity products in a phase manner at its manufacturing unit at Plot No. 441 to 456 Nr. N. H. 8 Village Narsanda Dist. Kheda Gujarat.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Vidya Wires Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from December 10 2025 the Equity Shares of Vidya Wires Ltd (Scrip Code: 544633) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251209- dated December 09 2025.
